title: Morning News Call - Canada, October 9
text:
© Reuters. Morning News Call - Canada, October 9

To access a PDF version of this newsletter, please click here http://share.thomsonreuters.com/assets/newsletters/Morning_News_Call/MNCGeneric_CA_10092019.pdf

You can read Morning News Call Canada via TOPNEWS Canada page.

If you would like to receive this newsletter through your email, please register at:

http://solutions.refinitiv.com/MorningNewsCallENsubscriptionpage

ECONOMIC EVENTS

1100 TR IPSOS PCSI for Oct: Prior 53.00

COMPANIES REPORTING RESULTS

October 9:

EXFO Inc (EXF). Expected Q4 earnings of 4 cents per share

October 10:

No major companies are scheduled to report for the day.

CORPORATE EVENTS

1700 EXFO Inc (EXF). Q4 earnings conference call

EX-DIVIDENDS

AGF Management Ltd (AGFb). Amount C$0.08

Onex Corp (ONEX). Amount C$0.10

Reitmans Canada Ltd (RETa). Amount C$0.05

Toronto-Dominion Bank (TD). Amount C$0.74

For Morning News Call U.S. -- a preview of market-moving news for the trading day:

- type US/MNC in a news browser if you are an Eikon user, or type RT/US/MNC in a news browser if you are a Thomson One user

For The Day Ahead -- a recap of the day's events and preview of the next trading day:

- type DAY/US in a news browser if you are an Eikon user or type RT/DAY/US in a news browser if you are a Thomson One user

For an index of our newsletters click on NEWSLETTERS
